Description: Epiphone SG Junior TV Yellow. Behold, the rare and elusive TV Yellow SG Jr!!! These are excellent guitars, I personally own three of them. This one has swapped out tuners for the vintage bean look, it has a GFS Dream 90 pickup, also come with original humbucker, witch hat knobs... The guitar has a new set of 9 -46 gauge strings, the fretboard treated, the frets are in great shape, this guitar plays and sounds awesome, the only issues are some damage the guitar originally received from its original shipment. There are some marks that have been touched up on the headstock, there are also a big gouge that has been colored yellow on the bottom right of the front of the guitar. With other miscellaneous marks here and there, besides that is an awesome playing and sounding guitar. The front of the guitar still has the original satin finish. The back of the guitar however was polished. It does polish up to a nice shine I did not want to do that on the front though. All my guitars are sold clean. Not all smudged up and filthy like some other guitars I see for sale. The guitar will ship fast and well protected. Please ask any questions you may have, and look at all pics before buying, as I do not accept returns. Continental US shipping only. Thanks
Title: Epiphone SG Junior TV Yellow
